long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Picker - Nonis is a versatile color picker tool designed for developers and designers. It enables you to generate colors based on RGBA and seamlessly add them to your palette. The generated colors are displayed on the left side of the SketchPicker library, allowing you to hover over them, click to copy the RGB value, and conveniently incorporate them into your designs. The palette also provides a convenient button to clear all colors at once.

EyeDrop Feature - Capture Colors from the Current Tab:
Effortlessly extract and utilize colors from the current tab, simplifying your color selection and matching designs to web page elements.

In addition, Color Picker - Nonis leverages the Chrome API to automatically save the color data as an object, ensuring easy access to your favorite colors. By utilizing the power of the Chrome API, your color selections are securely stored and readily available whenever you need them.

Simplify your color selection process and streamline your design workflow with Color Picker - Nonis, now powered by the Chrome API!
